verses.verse: כִּ֛י <WH3588> When נַ֥עַר <WH5288> [was] a child יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> When Israel וָאֹהֲבֵ֑הוּ <WH157> then I loved וּמִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt קָרָ֥אתִי <WH7121> him and called לִבְנִֽי׃ <WH1121> my son

קָרְא֖וּ <WH7121> [As] they called לָהֶ֑ם כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> the more הָלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> them so they went מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> from them לַבְּעָלִ֣ים <WH1168> unto Baalim יְזַבֵּ֔חוּ <WH2076> they sacrificed וְלַפְּסִלִ֖ים <WH6456> to graven images יְקַטֵּרֽוּן׃ <WH6999> and burned incense

וְאָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> is I תִרְגַּ֙לְתִּי֙ <WH7270> taught לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> Ephraim קָחָ֖ם <WH3947> taking עַל־ <WH5921> in זְרֽוֹעֹתָ֑יו <WH2220> them by their arms וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not יָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> but they knew כִּ֥י <WH3588> for רְפָאתִֽים׃ <WH7495> not that I healed

בְּחַבְלֵ֨י <WH2256> them with cords אָדָ֤ם <WH120> of a man אֶמְשְׁכֵם֙ <WH4900> I drew בַּעֲבֹת֣וֹת <WH5688> with bands אַהֲבָ֔ה <WH160> of love וָאֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> became לָהֶ֛ם כִּמְרִ֥ימֵי <WH7311> and I was to them as they that take off עֹ֖ל <WH5923> the yoke עַ֣ל <WH5921> from לְחֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3895> on their jaws וְאַ֥ט <WH328> secret אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to אוֹכִֽיל׃ <WH398> meat

לֹ֤א <WH3808> They will not יָשׁוּב֙ <WH7725> He shall not return אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> into the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְאַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> but the Assyrian ה֣וּא <WH1931> he מַלְכּ֑וֹ <WH4428> shall be his king כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because מֵאֲנ֖וּ <WH3985> because they refused לָשֽׁוּב׃ <WH7725> to return

וְחָלָ֥ה <WH2342> shall abide חֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> And the sword בְּעָרָ֔יו <WH5892> on his cities וְכִלְּתָ֥ה <WH3615> and shall consume בַדָּ֖יו <WH905> his branches וְאָכָ֑לָה <WH398> and devour מִֽמֹּעֲצ֖וֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4156> [them] because of their own counsels

וְעַמִּ֥י <WH5971> And my people תְלוּאִ֖ים <WH8511> are bent לִמְשֽׁוּבָתִ֑י <WH4878> to backsliding וְאֶל־ <WH413> about עַל֙ <WH5920> them to the most High יִקְרָאֻ֔הוּ <WH7121> from me though they called יַ֖חַד <WH3162> none at all לֹ֥א <WH3808> None יְרוֹמֵם׃ <WH7311> would exalt

אֵ֞יךְ <WH349> How אֶתֶּנְךָ֣ <WH5414> How shall I give thee up אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> Ephraim אֲמַגֶּנְךָ֙ <WH4042> deliver יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel אֵ֚יךְ <WH349> How אֶתֶּנְךָ֣ <WH5414> make כְאַדְמָ֔ה <WH126> Admah אֲשִֽׂימְךָ֖ <WH7760> appoint כִּצְבֹאיִ֑ם <WH6636> Zeboiim נֶהְפַּ֤ךְ <WH2015> is turned עָלַי֙ <WH5921> within לִבִּ֔י <WH3820> care for יַ֖חַד <WH3162> together נִכְמְר֥וּ <WH3648> are kindled נִחוּמָֽי׃ <WH5150> within me my repentings

לֹ֤א <WH3808> I will not אֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> I will not execute חֲר֣וֹן <WH2740> the fierceness אַפִּ֔י <WH639> of mine anger לֹ֥א <WH3808> not אָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> I will not return לְשַׁחֵ֣ת <WH7843> to destroy אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> Ephraim כִּ֣י <WH3588> For אֵ֤ל <WH410> for I [am] God אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not אִ֔ישׁ <WH582> in בְּקִרְבְּךָ֣ <WH7130> in the midst קָד֔וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and I will not אָב֖וֹא <WH935> of thee and I will not enter בְּעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> into the city

אַחֲרֵ֧י <WH310> after יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD יֵלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> will walk כְּאַרְיֵ֣ה <WH738> like a lion יִשְׁאָ֑ג <WH7580> he shall roar כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Indeed ה֣וּא <WH1931> He יִשְׁאַ֔ג <WH7580> when he shall roar וְיֶחֶרְד֥וּ <WH2729> shall tremble בָנִ֖ים <WH1121> then the children מִיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> from the west

יֶחֶרְד֤וּ <WH2729> They shall tremble כְצִפּוֹר֙ <WH6833> as a bird מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וּכְיוֹנָ֖ה <WH3123> and as a dove מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land אַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> of Assyria וְהוֹשַׁבְתִּ֥ים <WH3427> and I will place עַל־ <WH5921> in בָּתֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH1004> them in their houses נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

סְבָבֻ֤נִי <WH5437> compasseth בְכַ֙חַשׁ֙ <WH3585> me about with lies אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> Ephraim וּבְמִרְמָ֖ה <WH4820> with deceit בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> but Judah עֹ֥ד <WH5750> is also רָד֙ <WH7300> yet ruleth עִם־ <WH5973> against אֵ֔ל <WH410> with God וְעִם־ <WH5973> against קְדוֹשִׁ֖ים <WH6918> with the saints נֶאֱמָֽן׃ <WH539> and is faithful
